description: The World Council of Churches says returning the Turkish landmark to a mosque is mistaken.
title: Hagia Sophia: World Council of Churches appeals to Turkey on mosque decision
title_page: Hagia Sophia: World Council of Churches appeals to Turkey on mosque decision - BBC News
maintext: He defended his decision on Friday by stressing that the country had exercised its sovereign right in converting the building back to a mosque. The first Muslim prayers would be held on 24 July.
